sentences: Ma loodan, et sa tuled homme.
context: The Estonian word 'loodan' means 'I hope' or 'to expect'. It is the first-person singular form of the verb lootma (to hope). This verb expresses positive expectation for something to happen in the future. In other forms, it can be expressed as: lootame (we hope), loodavad (they hope), lootad (you hope). The word often appears with conjunction 'et' (that) when expressing what is hoped for.
